author: Around The NFL staff
title: Breaking: NFL to hold 'fully virtual' draft - NFL.com
description: Breaking: NFL to hold 'fully virtual' draft NFL.com Will more free agent deals fall apart after 2020 NFL Draft? | Pro Football Talk | NBC Sports NBC Sports Dolphins should select best players available in 1st round of NFL draft Orlando Sentinel Chicago Bears …
content:
Commissioner Roger Goodell informed all 32 NFL clubs that the 2020 NFL Draft would proceed in a fully virtual format in a memo sent out Monday obtained by NFL Network's Tom Pelissero. 
League and club facilities are set to remain closed indefinitely, to ensu… [+4549 chars]
